recipes.name: Pad Thai
recipes.instructions:
1. Soak rice noodles in warm water
2. Heat oil in wok
3. Scramble eggs
4. Add shrimp and cook
5. Add noodles and sauce
6. Toss with bean sprouts
7. Garnish with peanuts
8. Serve hot

recipes.name: Tom Yum Soup
recipes.instructions:
1. Boil water with lemongrass
2. Add galangal and lime leaves
3. Add shrimp and cook
4. Season with fish sauce
5. Add chili and lime juice
6. Serve hot

recipes.name: Green Curry
recipes.instructions:
1. Heat curry paste in pan
2. Add chicken and cook
3. Pour coconut milk
4. Add vegetables
5. Simmer until done
6. Add Thai basil
7. Serve with rice
